name: Weapon Attack
effect: Make an Attack using a _Wielded_ Weapon. Refer to the Weapon for all details about the specific Attack, such as its _Speed_ and whether it is _Light_, _Versatile_, or _Heavy_.

name: Charged Attack
desc: You gather yourself before unleashing a devastating attack.
effect: Choose a _Major Attack_ with a _Charged Effect_. Instead of immediately making the _Attack_, instead create a _Hazard_ equal to the _Area_ the _Charged Effect_ would Target (a single space within _Range_ if no Area is listed). End your _Turn_, then become _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove _Charging_ and the _Hazard_, then resolve the _Attack_ against all creatures in the _Area_. You may choose to not make this _Attack_ and instead gain 1 _Momentum_ when removing the _Hazard_.
special: You may only use this _Attack_ when a _Technique_ specifically says to use it.

name: Quickened Attack
desc: You find it easy to slip in additional strike with a swift weapon.
effect:
Use a _Light_ _Major Attack_ with a _Speed_ of 3 or less. The _Speed_ of this Attack is adjusted as follows:
* _Speed_ 1: _Speed_ 4
* _Speed_ 2: _Speed_ 6
* _Speed_ 3: _Speed_ 8

name: Punch
desc: An untrained yet still effective strike.

name: Grapple
desc: You attempt to grab a foe, doing limited damage but limiting their mobility.

name: Slam
desc: An untrained strike making use of the body itself to body-slam a foe.

name: Swipe
desc: A swift attack using a natural weapon.
effect: Make an _Attack_ using a _Natural_ _Melee_ Weapon, adding [_Glancing_]. Refer to the Weapon for all details about the specific Attack, such as its _Speed_ and whether it is _Light_, _Versatile_, or _Heavy_.

name: Toxic Spray
desc: A short-ranged spray of toxic chemicals.
